diff_act: 1.support the visualization of up to 2000 biological data points in a 3D space
2.Identify single click event over a data point to display the data point's name and allow interaction with multiple points.
3.Display full details about the data point on double-click

regen.absent_element: interaction with multiple data points in a single click
regen.new_specification: The product should allow multiple data points to be clicked simultaneously to display their respective names.

regen.absent_element: explicit mention of simultaneous multi-point interaction
regen.new_specification: The product should support selection and interaction with multiple data points via simultaneous mouse clicks.

regen.absent_element: interaction with multiple data points simultaneously
regen.new_specification: The product should allow users to simultaneously interact with multiple data points to reveal each data point's name on single-click.

label: The product should allow multiple points to be clicked so that multiple names can be displayed.
absence: action of clicking multiple points to display multiple names of the data points
